languages.text: "Ловко. Если бы вы приобрели это топливо для эскадры на другом конце Империума, могли бы вообще не платить — мы бы успели обратиться в прах, прежде чем вы слетали туда-обратно".
"Clever. If you had been purchasing fuel for a squadron at the other end of the Imperium, you may never have had to pay at all — we would have turned to dust before you made it there and back."
languages.original_text: "Ловко. Если бы вы приобрели это топливо для эскадры на другом конце Империума, могли бы вообще не платить — мы бы успели обратиться в прах, прежде чем вы слетали туда-обратно".

traits.locale_text: "Clever. If you had been purchasing fuel for a squadron at the other end of the Imperium, you may never have had to pay at all — we would have turned to dust before you made it there and back."
"Clever. If you had been purchasing fuel for a squadron at the other end of the Imperium, you may never have had to pay at all — we would have turned to dust before you made it there and back."
"Clever. If you had been purchasing fuel for a squadron at the other end of the Imperium, you may never have had to pay at all — we would have turned to dust before you made it there and back."
"Clever. If you had been purchasing fuel for a squadron at the other end of the Imperium, you may never have had to pay at all — we would have turned to dust before you made it there and back."

languages.text: 「賢いな。もしお前が帝国の反対側にいる航宙隊のために燃料を購入していたら、金を払う必要はなかったかもしれない…お前がそこに行って戻ってくるまでに、我々は塵と化していただろう」
languages.original_text: "Clever. If you had been purchasing fuel for a squadron at the other end of the Imperium, you may never have had to pay at all — we would have turned to dust before you made it there and back."

traits.locale_text: 「賢いな。もしお前が帝国の反対側にいる航宙隊のために燃料を購入していたら、金を払う必要はなかったかもしれない…お前がそこに行って戻ってくるまでに、我々は塵と化していただろう」

languages.text: “真聪明，如果你们在帝国的另一端为舰队购买燃料，那你说不定根本不用付钱。因为在这个来来回回的过程中，我们恐怕早就化为尘土了。”
languages.original_text: "Clever. If you had been purchasing fuel for a squadron at the other end of the Imperium, you may never have had to pay at all — we would have turned to dust before you made it there and back."

traits.locale_text: “真聪明，如果你们在帝国的另一端为舰队购买燃料，那你说不定根本不用付钱。因为在这个来来回回的过程中，我们恐怕早就化为尘土了。”

languages.text: «Muy inteligente. Si hubiera estado comprando combustible para un escuadrón al extremo del Imperium, no habría tenido que pagar nada. Para cuando hubiera ido y venido, ya no seríamos más que un montón de polvo».
languages.original_text: "Clever. If you had been purchasing fuel for a squadron at the other end of the Imperium, you may never have had to pay at all — we would have turned to dust before you made it there and back."

traits.locale_text: «Muy inteligente. Si hubiera estado comprando combustible para un escuadrón al extremo del Imperium, no habría tenido que pagar nada. Para cuando hubiera ido y venido, ya no seríamos más que un montón de polvo».

languages.text: « Malin. Si vous aviez acheté du carburant pour un escadron à l'autre bout de l'Imperium, vous auriez même pu vous en tirer sans payer du tout ; nous aurions fini en poussière le temps que vous fassiez l'aller-retour. »
languages.original_text: "Clever. If you had been purchasing fuel for a squadron at the other end of the Imperium, you may never have had to pay at all — we would have turned to dust before you made it there and back."

traits.locale_text: « Malin. Si vous aviez acheté du carburant pour un escadron à l'autre bout de l'Imperium, vous auriez même pu vous en tirer sans payer du tout ; nous aurions fini en poussière le temps que vous fassiez l'aller-retour. »

languages.text: "Nicht dumm. Hättet Ihr Treibstoff für eine Schwadron am anderen Ende des Imperiums gekauft, hättet Ihr vielleicht gar nicht bezahlen müssen – wir wären vor Abschluss der Reise hin und zurück alle längst zu Staub zerfallen."
languages.original_text: "Clever. If you had been purchasing fuel for a squadron at the other end of the Imperium, you may never have had to pay at all — we would have turned to dust before you made it there and back."

traits.locale_text: "Nicht dumm. Hättet Ihr Treibstoff für eine Schwadron am anderen Ende des Imperiums gekauft, hättet Ihr vielleicht gar nicht bezahlen müssen – wir wären vor Abschluss der Reise hin und zurück alle längst zu Staub zerfallen."

languages.text: "Zekice. İyi ki İmparatorluk'un öte ucundaki bir eskadra için yakıt almamışsınız. Siz oraya gidip gelene kadar ölüp giderdik."
languages.original_text: "Clever. If you had been purchasing fuel for a squadron at the other end of the Imperium, you may never have had to pay at all — we would have turned to dust before you made it there and back."

traits.locale_text: "Zekice. İmparatorluk'un öte ucundaki bir filoya yakıt sipariş etmiş olsaydınız hiç ödeme yapmanıza gerek kalmazdı. Oraya gidip gelene kadar ölüp giderdik."
